Class Point3i

java.lang.Object
  |

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
public class Point3i
extends Tuple3i
implements java.io.Serializable

A 3 element point represented by signed integer x,y,z coordinates.

Since:
Java 3D 1.2
See Also:
Serialized Form
